marklogic.body: In the harsh world of business, having 2 stores 100 yards apart in Slough, and at least 6 stores in Glasgow etc was not financially viable, if the company isn't in administration then contracted redundancy and notice periods come into play, pushing the company further into debt and making it an even less saleable prospect. As Cold as it is, it's standard practice for administrators to lay Off staff before moving the company on - has just saved a prospective buyer millions... Bad news for the employees mind, not a time I'd fancy being out of work..
